mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_rcpt_ship_carton_detail ( wh_id, po_number, item_number, shipment_number, line_number, expect_qty, ucc, reference1, reference2, reference3, reference4, reference5, status, fork_id, dimension, hu_id, generic_field_1, generic_field_2, generic_field_3, generic_field_4, generic_field_5, generic_field_6, generic_field_7, generic_field_8, generic_field_9, generic_field_10, generic_field_11, generic_field_12, generic_field_13, generic_field_14, generic_field_15, schedule_number, SendToLocalDB, SendDate, container_label, picking_list_id, scan_flag, qty_received ) VALUES ( #{whId}, #{poNumber}, #{itemNumber}, #{shipmentNumber}, #{lineNumber}, #{expectQty}, #{ucc}, #{reference1}, #{reference2}, #{reference3}, #{reference4}, #{reference5}, #{status}, #{forkId}, #{dimension}, #{huId}, #{genericField1}, #{genericField2}, #{genericField3}, #{genericField4}, #{genericField5}, #{genericField6}, #{genericField7}, #{genericField8}, #{genericField9}, #{genericField10}, #{genericField11}, #{genericField12}, #{genericField13}, #{genericField14}, #{genericField15}, #{scheduleNumber}, #{sendToLocalDb}, #{sendDate}, #{containerLabel}, #{pickingListId}, #{scanFlag}, #{qtyReceived} )

INSERT INTO t_rcpt_ship_carton_detail ( wh_id, po_number, item_number, shipment_number, line_number, expect_qty, ucc, reference1, reference2, reference3, reference4, reference5, status, fork_id, dimension, hu_id, generic_field_1, generic_field_2, generic_field_3, generic_field_4, generic_field_5, generic_field_6, generic_field_7, generic_field_8, generic_field_9, generic_field_10, generic_field_11, generic_field_12, generic_field_13, generic_field_14, generic_field_15, schedule_number, SendToLocalDB, SendDate, container_label, picking_list_id, scan_flag, qty_received ) VALUES
( #{item.whId}, #{item.poNumber}, #{item.itemNumber}, #{item.shipmentNumber}, #{item.lineNumber}, #{item.expectQty}, #{item.ucc}, #{item.reference1}, #{item.reference2}, #{item.reference3}, #{item.reference4}, #{item.reference5}, #{item.status}, #{item.forkId}, #{item.dimension}, #{item.huId}, #{item.genericField1}, #{item.genericField2}, #{item.genericField3}, #{item.genericField4}, #{item.genericField5}, #{item.genericField6}, #{item.genericField7}, #{item.genericField8}, #{item.genericField9}, #{item.genericField10}, #{item.genericField11}, #{item.genericField12}, #{item.genericField13}, #{item.genericField14}, #{item.genericField15}, #{item.scheduleNumber}, #{item.sendToLocalDb}, #{item.sendDate}, #{item.containerLabel}, #{item.pickingListId}, #{item.scanFlag}, #{item.qtyReceived} )

update.foreach: UPDATE t_rcpt_ship_carton_detail SET expect_qty = #{item.expectQty}, ucc = #{item.ucc}, reference1 = #{item.reference1}, reference2 = #{item.reference2}, reference3 = #{item.reference3}, reference4 = #{item.reference4}, reference5 = #{item.reference5}, status = #{item.status}, fork_id = #{item.forkId}, dimension = #{item.dimension}, hu_id = #{item.huId}, generic_field_1 = #{item.genericField1}, generic_field_2 = #{item.genericField2}, generic_field_3 = #{item.genericField3}, generic_field_4 = #{item.genericField4}, generic_field_5 = #{item.genericField5}, generic_field_6 = #{item.genericField6}, generic_field_7 = #{item.genericField7}, generic_field_8 = #{item.genericField8}, generic_field_9 = #{item.genericField9}, generic_field_10 = #{item.genericField10}, generic_field_11 = #{item.genericField11}, generic_field_12 = #{item.genericField12}, generic_field_13 = #{item.genericField13}, generic_field_14 = #{item.genericField14}, generic_field_15 = #{item.genericField15}, schedule_number = #{item.scheduleNumber}, SendToLocalDB = #{item.sendToLocalDb}, SendDate = #{item.sendDate}, container_label = #{item.containerLabel}, picking_list_id = #{item.pickingListId}, scan_flag = #{item.scanFlag}, qty_received = #{item.qtyReceived} WHERE wh_id = #{item.whId} AND po_number = #{item.poNumber} AND item_number = #{item.itemNumber} AND shipment_number = #{item.shipmentNumber} AND line_number = #{item.lineNumber}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_rcpt_ship_carton_detail WHERE wh_id = #{whId} AND shipment_number = #{shipmentNumber}
